dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.perf.cat.spec.PerformanceCatSpecRelationship
dataStructure.description:
A specification for an association that can be established between two instances of PerformanceCategories. For example, a relationship can be established between a Codec instance and BearerType instance.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: PerformanceCatSpecRelationship

child.name: relationshipType
child.description:
An indicator that specifies the type of relationship that can be established between PerformanceCategories associated to the related PerformanceCategorySpecifications.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: relationshipType

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time for which a PerformanceCatSpecRelationship is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: numberRelCatUpperLimit
child.description:
The upper limit of the number of PerformanceCategories that can related. Values can range from 0 to unbounded.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: numberRelCatUpperLimit

child.name: numberRelCatLowerLimit
child.description:
The lower limit of the number of PerformanceCategories that can related. Values can range from 0 to unbounded.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: numberRelCatLowerLimit
